sentences.en: Each of the rooms has a superb view of Pissouri Bay.
sentences.cn: 每个房间都能将皮苏里湾的美景尽收眼底。

sentences.en: He is, by all accounts, a superb teacher.
sentences.cn: 他是位有口皆碑的好老师。

sentences.en: I was tempted to stay and hear this superb orchestra rehearse.
sentences.cn: 我真想留下来听这支高超的管弦乐队排练.

sentences.en: It makes a superb filling for cakes and sponges.
sentences.cn: 它非常适合做蛋糕和软布丁的馅儿。

sentences.en: People gasped with admiration at the superb skill of the gymnasts.
sentences.cn: 体操运动员的高超技艺令人赞叹.

sentences.en: Superb musical interludes were provided by Sinclair.
sentences.cn: 辛克莱献上了精彩的幕间音乐表演。

sentences.en: The large bay has a superb backdrop of mountains.
sentences.cn: 大海湾背靠着庄严的山脉.
这个管弦乐团的演奏棒极了。

sentences.en: The Potala stands more superb than ever in the bright sun.
sentences.cn: 布达拉宫比过去更加壮丽地矗立在灿烂的阳光中.

sentences.en: The superb sets are enhanced by Bobby Crossman's marvellous costumes.
sentences.cn: 博比·克罗斯曼绝妙的服装为华丽的舞台增色不少。

sentences.en: There is a superb panorama of the mountains from the hotel.
sentences.cn: 从旅馆可饱览峰峦叠嶂的雄伟景观。

sentences.en: They dished up a superb meal.
sentences.cn: 他们准备了一桌丰盛的饭菜。

sentences.en: They laid on a superb evening.
sentences.cn: 他们办了一场非常精彩的晚会。

sentences.en: You have to admire her superb draughtsmanship.
sentences.cn: 你不得不佩服她那一流的绘画水平。

words.tran_cn: 雄伟地；壮丽地；上等地；庄重地
特级品，特大号；临时雇员
